results.title: A resolution designating May 5, 2017, as the "National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Native Women and Girls".
results.short_title: A resolution designating May 5, 2017, as the "National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Native Women and Girls".
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2728)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates May 5, 2017, as the National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Native Women and Girls.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates May 5, 2017, as the National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Native Women and Girls.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2728)
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2728)
